extendedInfo.description: OverviewinPractice provides insight and practical recommendations for HIV patient care.Subject Matter: HIVDesigned forPhysicians and other healthcare professionals including:â¢	Infectious disease specialistsâ¢	Primary care practitioners managing patients with HIVâ¢	Residents/fellowsâ¢	Other specialists managing patients with HIVâ¢	Nurses, nurse practitioners, and physician assistants caring for patients with HIVKey Components â¢	Expert-authored, comprehensive HIV reference workâ¢	Continuously updated to incorporate latest findings and best practicesâ¢	Complete drug database (by Lexi-Comp; includes all FDA-approved drugs)â¢	Practice guidelinesâ¢	Relevant PubMed abstracts (MEDLINE)â¢	ClinicalTrials.govIn PracticeâNot Just in TheoryTranslates the constant stream of latest developments in HIV into clinically applicable information.â¢	Search and find targeted recommendations for your patient care questionsâ¢	Know that the evidence supports your decisionsEfficiently CurrentIntegrates insightful Conference Coverage, drug developments, journal citations, and guidelines to keep you abreast of the developments you can apply to practice. Education With RelevanceEarn CME credit for the topics youâre searching anyway. (To claim credit, just visit the free, companion Web site.)Additional Features	â¢	Easily share information with colleagues or traineesâ¢	Integrated bookmark function for quick return access to key topicsâ¢	Companion Web site includedHow to Gain Access:Free, one-time registration or use your existing Clinical Care Options member ID. (Your information will not be shared or sold to third parties.)

reviews.title: poor layout on phone
reviews.comment: I do like the website, but am disappointed that the design for android has some difficulties with smartphone screen. I can\'t use the app....yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Be wary
reviews.comment: Forces registration before can be used. Nice way to get hold of personal details. Should be removed from android market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix layout
reviews.comment: Formatting is poor on Samsung s3, text is too large, margins too wide allowing only a few words per line making it nearly unreadable. Same problem with the hepatology module. Please fix as otherwise great app!
reviews.author: A Google User
